name: Just Jumping (Keelan Moore)
description:
Just a simple jumping game. 
I want to  get back into  hobbyist game development after 5 years and this was a short simple project with only two goals: 

  1. Re-learn Unity (and the suite of game development tools)
  2. Finish a functional, not necessarily fun, thing

Music was found on opengameart.org  by wyver9
